other_tests.findings: Marked interval improvement in the pleural effusions, small residual effusion in the left base, marked decrease in intra-abdominal fluid, an approximately 5.3 x 4.4 cm area of probable phlegmonous aggregate anteriorly in the right flank; pancreas somewhat diffusely enlarged with homogeneous enhancement without evidence of necrosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: There has been marked decrease in the stranding posterior to the pancreas.
